mapper.sql: id, userid, infoid, reservationtime, creatime, state
mapper.select: SELECT r.creatime reservationtime, r.iscomment iscomment, i.name name, i.id id, c.categoryname categoryname FROM reservation r LEFT JOIN info i on i.id = r.infoid LEFT JOIN category c on c.id = i.categoryid WHERE userid = #{userid} order by r.creatime desc

SELECT i.NAME name, i.phone phone, i.image image, u.uname uname, u.phone uphone, r.creatime creatime, r.iscomment iscomment, r.id id FROM reservation r LEFT JOIN USER u ON u.id = r.userid LEFT JOIN info i ON i.id = r.infoid WHERE r.state = 1 ORDER BY r.creatime desc
